lead_paragraph: An army general and police security chief were among the dead in a Taliban assault at rush hour. Just before midnight, another blast shook central Kabul.

byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and JAWAD SUKHANYAR

headline.print_headline: Taliban Bombings Kill Senior Afghan Officials
headline.main: Coordinated Bombs in Kabul Kill Senior Afghan Officials at Defense Ministry

snippet: An army general and police security chief were among the dead in a Taliban assault at rush hour. Just before midnight, another blast shook central Kabul....
abstract: Dual bombings by Taliban at Afghan Defense Ministry in Kabul kill at least 24 people and wound dozens; army general and police colonel are among casualties of coordinated attack.
